game.name: Irradiate 235
game.shortDescription: Discover and automate unique materials. Engineer the machines and tools for your factory. Handle hazardous materials to make explosives and near-limitless energy. Use your own tools to navigate a labyrinth of alien passages and uncover untouched tunnels in this innovative Automation-Metroidvania.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Discover and automate unique materials. Engineer the machines and tools for your factory. Handle hazardous materials to make explosives and near-limitless energy. Use your own tools to navigate a labyrinth of alien passages and uncover untouched tunnels in this innovative Automation-Metroidvania.
